thread.title: 14 Weird AF Things Women Literally Only Do In Adverts
thread.title_full: 14 Weird AF Things Women Literally Only Do In Adverts

author: Jasmin Nahar
title: 14 Weird AF Things Women Literally Only Do In Adverts
text:
View this image › 
Tampax No woman would invite stress into their life like this.
ID: 10704565 2. Appear to reach orgasm through touching their freshly washed hair. View this image › 
Herbal Essences If all it took was washing your hair to come, dry shampoo wouldn’t exist anymore.
ID: 10704567 3. Brush their teeth with no toothpaste on the brush whatsoever. View this image › 
Oral B Rather than loads of toothpaste foam which they would somehow get smeared on the side of their cheek.
ID: 10704570 4. Eat yoghurt with the spoon upside down. View this image › 
Liberte See also: ice cream.
ID: 10704566 5. Wax a completely hairless leg. View this image › 
Veet ID: 10704569 6. Playfully cup and caress their faces after putting on some serum. Loreal
Loreal
  Because in an ideal world, women would always be gently brushing their hands over one side of their faces while making direct eye contact with people.
ID: 10705082 7. Keep chocolate in a luxurious box amongst trinkets, instead of in the cupboard. View this image › 
Galaxy Because chocolate doesn’t belong in the kitchen, it belongs with your sea shell collection.
ID: 10705095 8. And close their eyes while eating ice cream to make it a more ~sensual~ experience . View this image › 
Magnum This applies to pretty much any phallic food. It’s almost like they’re trying to insinuate something .
ID: 10705410 9. Announce pregnancy to your friends by whipping out the actual test over a chat at the dining table. View this image › 
Clearblue Just in case they don’t believe you.
ID: 10705114 10. Apply deodorant in one single, gentle swipe. View this image › 
Dove ID: 10705731 11. And apply lotion by gently caressing their legs from ankle to thigh. View this image › 
Aveeno While wearing the staple wardrobe of a TV advert lady – a silky robe.
ID: 10705740 12. Laugh while in the shower as if the water is telling them a funny joke. View this image › 
Nivea “Haha, classic shower!” – this person probably.
ID: 10705866 13. Shut their eyes and smile blissfully when putting on clothes washed with fabric softener. View this image › 
Lenor Before rubbing their clothes all over their face and doing a deep, creepy inhale.
ID: 10705939 14. And wash their face by flinging water into the air with reckless abandon. View this image › 
Neutrogena Imagine cleaning that shit up every day. 
ID: 10704571 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Jasmin Nahar is a junior staff writer at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
